text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses the US filing strategy and the associated use requirement. In Section 3.1, under the 'Use requirement' comparison table for the US, it states: 'Strict \u201cuse-in-commerce\u201d: you must file a \u201cStatement of Use\u201d within 6\u201312 months of registration, otherwise the mark will be cancelled.' Furthermore, in Section 3.2, it reiterates: 'If you are still evaluating a US launch... you must later file a Statement of Use (or a \u201crequest for extension\u201d) within 3 years.' This directly satisfies the criterion requiring advice on the Statement of Use (SOU) requirement for an Intent-to-Use (ITU) application in the US.", "criterion_id": "8b8d3fe3-25aa-4b9b-9b24-1983d2892740"}
